The final version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''February 6, 2010''', at 14:37 UTC, which fixed text rendering causing FPS dropping.<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(09:21:48) <LG_Legacy> Hey Notch, how come when text is displaying on the screen usually taking up the whole screen, our FPS drops?"..."(09:25:43) <Notch> LG_Legacy: That's interesting.."..."(09:37:39) <Notch> there we go. Text should be a LOT faster now"..."(09:38:01) <Notch> ok, is. ;)"</ref>
This is the last version of 0.31, as the next version, [[Indev 20100206-2034]], was the first version to remove the "0.31" label, becoming just "[[Minecraft Indev]]".

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed text rendering causing FPS dropping.<ref name=":0"/>

== Trivia ==
* This was the last version without [[farming]].
